code: import'./App.css';import imageRickMorty from'./img/rick-morty.png';import{useState}from'react';import Character from'./components/Characters';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[characters,setCharacters]=useState(null);const reqApi=async()=>{const api=await fetch('https://rickandmortyapi.com/api/character');const characterApi=await api.json();setCharacters(characterApi.results);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"App-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"title",children:"Rick & Morty"}),characters?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Character,{characters:characters,setCharacters:setCharacters}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:imageRickMorty,alt:"Rick & Morty",className:"img-home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:reqApi,className:"btn-search",children:"Buscar Personajes :D"})]})]})});}export default App;
